title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 351.4 - Front end detection system (FEDS) referrals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 351.4 - Front end detection system (FEDS) referrals

State Regulations

The appropriate social services eligibility worker must
refer applicants for assistance to the social services district's FEDS
investigative unit in accordance with criteria set forth in the district's
approved FEDS plan submitted to the department in accordance with Part 348 of
this Title. Any referrals to the FEDS investigative unit must not delay the
eligibility determination process beyond the timeframes established by the

Social Services Law or this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
351.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
